presets.name: Professional Male
presets.prompt_text: Hello, thank you for calling. How may I assist you today?
presets.description: Clear, authoritative male voice suitable for business presentations

presets.name: Friendly Female
presets.prompt_text: Hi there! I'm so excited to help you with this project.
presets.description: Warm, approachable female voice for conversational content

presets.name: Narrator
presets.prompt_text: In the beginning, there was nothing but endless darkness and silence.
presets.description: Deep, engaging voice perfect for storytelling and audiobooks

presets.name: Energetic
presets.prompt_text: Let's go! This is going to be absolutely amazing!
presets.description: High-energy, enthusiastic voice for promotional content

presets.name: Calm Guide
presets.prompt_text: Take a deep breath and relax. Everything will be alright.
presets.description: Soothing, gentle voice for meditation and wellness content
